data.title: This Place is Just Cool
data.text:
Stopped in The Century Bar for a cocktail before our dinner reservation. I am not a Bourbon drinker, but my husband is and I have been wanting to bring him here for a while. We were not disappointed. First the bar area with the wood canopy is beautiful, this is a historic canopy bar that you will probably not find in too many places anymore. 

We were fortunate to have several drinks made in front of us at the bar to help us decide what to try. I've read that even if you are not bourbon drinker that they can make a drink that you will like and it's true! My husband had a traditional Old Fashion and I had a new cocktail that is their take on a summer shandy beer. First sip tasted like pure liquor, but it grew on me very quickly and it was over ice so it was very nice and very refreshing. Also lucky enough to see what I would like to try next time and tried a small taste of a traditional Whiskey Sour, awesome! 

These are traditional cocktails folks...no purple hooters here! Enjoy the atmosphere, strike up a conversation with the couple sitting next to you at the bar and Drink Responsibly :) Definitely going back to The Century Bar!

data.title: Bourbon at its Best
data.text:
A vintage tavern, you will be be impressed with this distinguished venue once you pass through the doors of an unassuming building.  Dim lights, cast a soothing glow upon the magnificent back bar.  The bourbon selection is unprecedented with an exhaustive menu of spirits  ranging in price from $8 a shot to over $100 for a cocktail glass of liquid gold.

I opted for a Rye Manhattan blessed with an amazing vermouth and bourbon soaked cherries (2).  Awesome.

Commendable service with colorful, friendly and bourbon savy bar tenders.

We plan a return visit to savor the Century Bar's signature Old Fashions and Whiskey Sours.  NOTE:  The bar is expanding with the introduction of a "speak easy" style  environment.  Can't wait!

data.title: INCREDIBLE WHISKEY COLLECTION AND A BEAUTIFUL SPACE
data.text: This is a truly one of a kind bar.  With nearly 300 whiskey selections ranging from $5-$150 per glass there is something for every whiskey lover.  Even if you don't drink whiskey its worth the trip to try one of their other libations and see the beautiful interior.  Highly recommended.

data.title: Quality cocktails and good times for one and all!
data.text: If you like bourbon, neat or mixed to perfection with fresh ingredients, then this is the joint for you.  We love the atmosphere where all types are welcome and everyone is instantly friends with the person sitting on the next stool.  Joe, Nick, Tim, and all the bartenders enjoy crafting drinks and know the history of just about every bottle they stock... probably all of them actually.  This also a great spot to start the night, bring a date, or stop in for a quick one after work.  Also, keep an eye out in late Summer 2016 for the opening of their new joint right next to the Century.  If you're in Dayton stop in the C Bar, you won't be disappointed!

data.title: Eclectic Spot
data.text: This is an eclectic spot to have a drink.  My only complaint is that they are very busy and aren't great about helping you decide what to drink.  We asked a customer sitting at the bar who guided helped us to pick out our drinks.  If you love bourbon, this is definitely your spot.  It has a great speakeasy feel.

data.title: time jump
data.text: Great cocktails and wide selection of bourbon and whiskey. I also feel like I walked into 1919 or 1920.  Love the jazz and ragtime music playing.

data.title: Amazing bourbon bar!
data.text:
This place is awesome and a real gem for Dayton. Absolutely check this place out! It continues to set a very high bar for any bourbon bar we've visited when traveling (including the big cities on both coasts).

The staff are extremely knowledgeable, friendly, and approachable. The bar itself is beautiful, and they have a truly impressive collection of bourbon and whiskeys. What you won't find are TVs or trendy, candy flavored cocktails. They also do not serve food.

This place is one of our hands down favorites in Dayton. Consistently ranked as one of the best bourbon bars in the nation. You will not be disappointed!

data.title: Rivals and **betters** what you will find on the East Coast - MUST Visit.
data.text:
You travel, I travel. The Century Bar rivals and betters what you find in NYC. 

Novice or aficionado of bourbon? Both welcomed here.  

These are GREAT guys at Century.  It's not just about the drinks or exhaustive options, it's about the overall experience.   

Sip, savour, socialize, learn.   No tv and put the phone down. You won't even want it. 

Century Bar will match you with the best bourbon (or bourbon cocktail) for your tastes, occasion, price points.

See you there - from a fellow patron on way to the half century club.  Four Roses Forever! 🌹🌹🌹
